abstract: Warner Bros, in effort to foster diversity in film industry, announces nine-month fellowship in which five aspiring filmmakers will be mentored by Warner executives.

headline.print_headline: Warner Bros. Plan for Film Diversity
headline.main: Warner Bros. Announces Incubator for ‘Underrepresented Talent’

snippet: The studio’s movie division will choose five aspiring filmmakers for a fellowship in which they will get help creating a short movie.
lead_paragraph: The studio’s movie division will choose five aspiring filmmakers for a fellowship in which they will get help creating a short movie.
